title: 索尼 Alpha 6600
features_en: ['World’s fastest AF at 0 02 sec with real-time AF and Object tracking', '24 2MP APS-C Exmor sensor with front end LSI and ISO up to 102 400', 'Wide 425-phase/425-contrast detection AF points over 84% of sensor', 'Up to 11fps continuous shooting at 24 2MP RAW with AF/AE tracking', 'Real-time AF Tracking Real-time Eye AF for human animal movie', '5-axis in-body image stabilization 5 step shutter speed advantage', 'External mic jack and headphone jack for professional audio monitoring', 'Touch Tracking provides smooth continuous focus tracking of your subject activated with a simple touch of the display screen']
description: ['The Alpha 6600 include a 24 2MP Exmore CMOS image sensor the latest bionz x image processor and a front-end LSI as implemented in Sony’s full-frame cameras which combine to deliver all-round enhancements in image quality and performance across all areas of photo and video capture.']

title: 索尼 Alpha 6500
features_en: ['24.2MP APS-C Exmore sensor w/ advanced processing up to ISO 51.200', 'Wide 425 phase detection AF points, Fast 0.05 sec. AF acquisition', '5-axis in-body image stabilization steadies every lens.APS-C type (23.5 x 15.6 mm)', '11fps continuous shooting to 269 frames at 24.2MP w/ AE/AF tracking', '4K movie w/ 2.4x oversampling, full pixel readout, no pixel binning', 'Mounting Type: Bayonet']
description: ['24.2 MP Exmore CMOS sensor with world’s fastest AF speed (0.05 sec.) and highest number of phase detection AF points (425). In-camera 5-axis optical image stabilization for every lens and enhanced AF features including intuitive and immediate touchscreen AF operation. 4K movie recording and pro video features including 2.4x oversampling with full pixel readout and no pixel binning, S-Log3/S-Log2, S-Gamut and gamma assist and more.']

title: 索尼 Alpha 6400
features_en: ['FAST AND PRECISE AUTOFOCUS: rely on 0.02s AF, Real Time tracking and Eye AF (human/animal) to keep your subject sharp in any situation.', 'PERFECT FOR VIDEO CREATORS: High resolution 4K HDR movie recording and Full HD slow motion feature (120p) with autofocus.', 'NEVER MISS A MOMENT: Up to 11fps with Autofocus.', 'CAPTURE CREATIVE ANGLES: easily frame up your subject when shooting from low or high angles with the tilting touch monitor.', 'IDEAL FOR: starters and advanced users who wants a compact everyday lens (Sony 16-50mm) and an additional zoom (Sony 55-210mm) to capture sports and nature..Ideal for Vloggers and Content creators - with high-resolution 4K HDR movie recording, Fast Hybrid AF for movie and 180-degree fully tiltable LCD touch screen.']
description: ['The next generation mirrorless camera with the world’s fastest Auto Focus', 'The ILCE-6400 combines the', 'compact size and light weight', 'of a mirrorless camera with the fast performance and some advanced features of a pro-level model. Stills or movies, creative compositions or everyday selfies – whatever your style, you can now capture beautiful images on the go.Packaged with the', '16-50mm Power Zoom Lens', ', the ILCE-6400 gives you the compact versatility to shoot your world your way – from candid street shots to close-up portraiture. Combined with the 180-degree flip screen on of the body, it’s also great for Vlogging & Selfies.', 'Keep life in sharp focus with the world’s fastest auto focus', 'No more worrying about soft edges and motion blur. This camera detects your subject in a world’s fastest time of just', '0.02 seconds', ', and because it uses', '425 phase-detection', 'and', '425-contrast-detection points', ', you can be sure it’s as accurate as it is lightning quick.You’ll also benefit from', 'Real-time Tracking', ', which locks the focus onto your subject and tracks it’s movement, even speed. Perfect for capturing rapid motion in street, sports or live event photography.', 'Take perfect portraits with Real-time Auto Focus', 'Shooting a portrait?', 'Real-time AF', 'uses new AI-based technology to consistently pick out the human faces in your frame and capture the eyes with tack-sharp focus.Plus, with', 'AF-C mode on', ', the camera will track your subject’s face as they move, even if it’s partially hidden, backlit or facing slightly away.', 'Take your content to the next level', 'Featuring a', '180-degree tilting 3” LCD screen', ', the camera lets you frame your own shot as you perform. And with the', 'built-in mic', ', you’re always ready to record. Alternatively, you can use the external mic jack – or even the XLR adaptor if it’s time to step up to a pro-level mic.If you’re getting creative behind the camera, you’ll enjoy', 'flawless 4K video and advanced colour grading', 'that renders your masterpieces in beautifully vivid colour. You can also create', 'breathtaking time-lapse videos', 'using', 'continuous shooting', 'with a pause of one to 60 seconds between shots, before bringing it all together on your PC.With', 'Enhanced Fast Hybrid AF,', 'you can capture the same brilliantly sharp focus for your motion pictures as your stills. Knowing that smooth, stable AF tracks your subject as they move, you can give your full attention to composing the perfect shot.', 'Capture all the action with continuous shooting at up to 11fps', 'You’ll never miss a moment with continuous shooting at up to 11fps (after view) or 8fps (live view) for bursts of up to 116 shots in JPEG and 46 in RAW. All this comes with the option of', 'silent shooting', '– ideal for taking subtle street snaps or capturing live performances.', 'See your images in stunning detail with the 24.2MP sensor', 'Intimate portraits, expansive cityscapes, sporting action – you can capture it all in remarkable detail, thanks to the large', 'APS-C Exmor CMOS image sensor', 'and new image processing engine', '. Enjoy beautifully crisp images, life-like colours and a more natural reproduction of textures and skin tones.With a new maximum', 'ISO of 32,000', '(up to 102,400 for stills) and enhanced noise reduction, this same flawless image-making even extends to darker scenes that require high-sensitivity shooting.']

features_zh: ['快速和精准的自动对焦：依靠0.02秒的自动对焦、实时跟踪和眼部自动对焦（人类/动物），在任何情况下保持主体清晰。', '适合视频创作者：高分辨率4K HDR电影录制和全高清慢动作功能（120p）带自动对焦。', '永远不错过任何时刻：最高11帧每秒自动对焦。', '拍摄创意角度：通过倾斜触摸显示屏，轻松将主体框入画面，从低角度或高角度拍摄。', '适合：初学者和高级用户，希望拥有一款紧凑的日常镜头（索尼16-50mm）和一个额外的变焦镜头（索尼55-210mm）来捕捉体育和自然风光。适合Vloggers和内容创作者 - 具有高分辨率的4K HDR电影录制，电影用快速混合自动对焦，以及180度全倾斜LCD触摸屏。']

title: 索尼 Alpha 6000
features_en: ['The Sony Alpha ZV-E10 features a 24.2-megapixel (approx. effective) APS-C Exmor CMOS sensor and BIONZ X image processing engine to produce high-quality images with high sensitivity, detailed texture depiction, and beautiful natural bokeh', 'Large-Format Image Sensor: This camera takes impressive images all thanks to the large 24.2 MP APS-C Exmor image sensor. Compared to other cameras, the image sensor of the ZV-E10 is more than ten times bigger than a smartphone sensor and three times bigger than a premium 1-inch sensor found in most compact cameras', 'Ideal for Selfies and Vlogs: Lightweight and compact at just 12.8 ounces this camera is ready to hit the road when you are. It features a side-opening vari-angle LCD screen that is perfect for framing selfies no matter your position. The ergonomic grip provides a secure and safe hold', 'Background Defocus: Background Defocus feature lets you simply press a single button to turn background blurring (bokeh) on and off. The button switches between the attached lens’s maximum aperture for a blurred, bokeh-rich background and either f/8 or f/11 (depending on lens) for a clearly focused one. No need for complicated settings here']
description: ['The Sony Alpha ZV-E10 features a 24.2-megapixel (approx. effective) APS-C Exmor CMOS sensor and BIONZ X image processing engine to produce high-quality images with high sensitivity, detailed texture depiction, and beautiful natural bokeh. The ZV-E10 also includes the acclaimed vlogging-specific features favored in the popular ZV-1 digital camera, including; Background Defocus, Product Showcase Setting, and Face Priority AE along with Sony’s highly acclaimed autofocus.', 'Find a Lens to Match Your Style', "Professional-looking vlogs are easy with the interchangeable lens ZV-E10 camera. Thanks to Sony's extensive range of E-mount lenses, you have a wide variety to capture the world however you choose to see it. Choose how you see the world and pick the lens that matches your style.", 'Large-Format Image Sensor', 'This camera takes impressive images all thanks to the large 24.2 MP APS-C Exmor image sensor. Compared to other cameras, the image sensor of the ZV-E10 is more than ten times bigger than a smartphone sensor and three times bigger than a premium 1-inch sensor found in most compact cameras. Thanks to that the ZV-E10 can maximize the amount of light collected and produce 4K movies with high-quality images and much less noise.', 'Bundle Includes:', 'Sony Alpha ZV-E10 APS-C Interchangeable Lens Mirrorless Vlog Camera with 16-50mm Lens (Black)', 'Sony Alpha ZV-E10 APS-C Interchangeable Lens Mirrorless Vlog Camera with 16-50mm Lens (Black)', '4 x 32GB Ultra SDHC UHS-I Memory Card', '4 x 32GB Ultra SDHC UHS-I Memory Card', '40.5mm 3-Piece UV, CPL, FLD Lens Filter Kit', '40.5mm 3-Piece UV, CPL, FLD Lens Filter Kit', 'Rechargeable 1300mAh Battery (2-Pack) and Dual Charger for Sony NP-FW50', 'Rechargeable 1300mAh Battery (2-Pack) and Dual Charger for Sony NP-FW50', 'Digital Compact LED Video Light', 'Digital Compact LED Video Light', 'Nostrand Avenue Camera System Gadget Bag with Accessory & Cleaning Kit', 'Nostrand Avenue Camera System Gadget Bag with Accessory & Cleaning Kit', 'Software Bundle of 4 Software (OEM Photo, Video, and Art Software Suite)', 'Software Bundle of 4 Software (OEM Photo, Video, and Art Software Suite)', 'HDMI Standard to Micro Cable', 'HDMI Standard to Micro Cable']

autofocus_system: Phase Detection, Contrast Detection with 179 AF points
features_zh: ['- Sony Alpha ZV-E10特点:\n- 24.2百万像素（有效像素）APS-C Exmor CMOS传感器，搭载BIONZ X图像处理引擎，可呈现高质量、高灵敏度的图像，具备细致纹理描绘能力和优美自然虚化效果。', '- 大画幅图像传感器：这款相机拍摄出色的照片都归功于大尺寸的24.2 MP APS-C Exmor图像传感器。与其他相机相比，ZV-E10相机的图像传感器比智能手机传感器大十倍以上，并且比大多数紧凑相机中常见的高端1英寸传感器大三倍。', '适合自拍和Vlog使用：轻便紧凑，重量仅为12.8盎司，随时随地可携带。拥有侧开式可旋转LCD屏幕，适用于各种角度拍摄自拍。人体工学握把提供了牢固安全的握持。', '背景虚化：背景虚化功能让您只需按一下按钮即可打开或关闭背景模糊（bokeh）。该按钮可在所附镜头的最大光圈和清晰对焦的f/8或者f/11（取决于镜头）之间切换，以实现模糊浓密的背景效果。这里不需要复杂的设置。']

title: 索尼 Alpha 1
features_en: ['True Flagship: The Sony Alpha 1 (a1) is a high-end full-frame mirrorless camera with a 50MP Stacked BSI-CMOS sensor and in-body image stabilization. The a1 offers blackout-free shooting on its giant 9.44M-dot (240 fps) EVF at burst rates of up to 30 fps. Also, the new BIONZ XR engine features advanced architecture that delivers 8x greater processing power.', "High Resolution & Advanced Tech: Sony a1 has latest autofocus system, with fast processing and face/eye/animal detection. Fast sensor readout enables 120 AF/AE calculations per second, even during 30fps bursts. The electronic shutter is designed to eliminate flicker and offers a flash sync of 1/200 sec (it's an impressive 1/400 sec with the mechanical shutter). AE latency is less than 0.033 s.", 'Optimized for Professional Workflows: As a flagship, the a1 is obviously targeting professional photographers and videographers and therefore makes sure it has optimal settings and functions to fit their workflow. It has super fast Wi-Fi with 2x2 MIMO, a USB Type-C port with 10 Gb/s, and a 1000BASE-T Ethernet. You also has FTP still and movie uploads and standard tethered shooting functionality.', '4K Movies at 120fps Frame Rate: The α1 supports high frame-rate internal 4K movie recording at up to 120fps, for smooth, expressive slow-motion playback at up to 5x. 10-bit 4:2:2 chroma subsampling can be used with Long-GOP or Intra (All-I) compression for outstanding image quality, while the new image sensor and BIONZ XR engine minimize image distortion.']
description: ['Sony Alpha 1 a flagship in the truest sense', "The a1 sits on the summit of Sony's definitive flagship mirrorless cameras. It is one all-encompassing model which manages to balance the features of multiple cameras. The a1 brings together the stills prowess of the a7R IV, the video spec of the a7S III, and the speed of the a9 II and improves on each in its respective categories.", 'Features & Specifications', '50.1-MP 35 mm full-frame stacked CMOS sensor with integral memory', '50.1-MP 35 mm full-frame stacked CMOS sensor with integral memory', 'Advanced BIONZ XR engine boosts speed by up to 8x40', 'Advanced BIONZ XR engine boosts speed by up to 8x40', 'Movie-making with 8K 30p and 4K 120p', 'Movie-making with 8K 30p and 4K 120p', 'Continuous shooting up to 30 fps for 200 consecutive frame with AF/AE tracking', 'Continuous shooting up to 30 fps for 200 consecutive frame with AF/AE tracking', 'Wide AF coverage with 759-point phase-detection and 425-point contrast-detection AF points', 'Wide AF coverage with 759-point phase-detection and 425-point contrast-detection AF points', 'ISO Sensitivity: Auto, 100-32000 (expands to 50-102400)', 'ISO Sensitivity: Auto, 100-32000 (expands to 50-102400)', 'Battery Life (Still Images): Approx. 430 shots (Viewfinder) / approx. 530 shots (LCD monitor)', 'Battery Life (Still Images): Approx. 430 shots (Viewfinder) / approx. 530 shots (LCD monitor)', 'MONITOR TYPE: 2.95 inch (3.0-type) wide type TFT', 'MONITOR TYPE: 2.95 inch (3.0-type) wide type TFT', 'Articulated Tilting LCD', 'Articulated Tilting LCD', 'Storage type: Dual SD/CFexpress Type A slots (UHS-II supported)', 'Storage type: Dual SD/CFexpress Type A slots (UHS-II supported)', 'Dimensions: 129 x 97 x 81 mm', 'Dimensions: 129 x 97 x 81 mm', 'Essential Bundle Accessories', 'Along with the accessories from Sony, the Sony a1 bundle Includes additional accessories', 'Promaster NP-FZ100 Sony Battery', 'Promaster NP-FZ100 Sony Battery', 'Water Resistant Gadget Bag', 'Water Resistant Gadget Bag', '2X 64GB Memory Card', '2X 64GB Memory Card', 'Micro SD Card Reader', 'Micro SD Card Reader', 'Cleaning Kit', 'Cleaning Kit', 'Dust-Off Blower', 'Dust-Off Blower']

details: {'sensor_type': 'Full-frame', 'resolution': '50.5 MP', 'autofocus_system': 'Phase Detection, Contrast Detection', 'lens_compatibility': 'Sony E', 'image_stabilization': 'Sensor-shift', 'video_capabilities': '4K at 30fps', 'electronic_viewfinder': 'Not specified', 'battery_life': 'Not specified', 'connectivity_options': 'Wi-Fi, USB', 'weight': 'Not specified', 'dimensions': 'Not specified', 'continuous_shooting_speed': '30 fps', 'low_light_performance': 'High, ISO up to 102400', 'dynamic_range': 'Not specified', 'iso_range': '100-102400', 'color': 'Black', 'max_shutter_speed': 'Not specified', 'min_shutter_speed': 'Not specified'}
features_zh: ['真正的旗舰：索尼Alpha 1（a1）是一款高端的全画幅无反相机，配备了一颗5000万像素的堆栈式BSI-CMOS传感器和机身内置图像稳定功能。a1在9.44兆点（240 fps）的巨型取景器上提供无黑屏拍摄，爆发速率高达30 fps。此外，全新的BIONZ XR引擎采用先进架构，提供8倍更强的处理能力。', '高分辨率和先进技术：Sony a1拥有最新的自动对焦系统，快速处理及人脸/眼睛/动物检测。快速传感器读出使得在连拍时每秒进行120次自动对焦/自动曝光计算成为可能。电子快门设计旨在消除闪烁，并提供1/200秒的闪光同步（使用机械快门时可达到令人印象深刻的1/400秒）。自动曝光延迟低于0.033秒。', '专为专业工作流程优化：作为旗舰产品，a1显然面向专业摄影师和视频制作人，因此确保具有最佳的设置和功能以适应他们的工作流程。它拥有超快的2x2 MIMO Wi-Fi、具有10 Gb/s的USB Type-C端口，以及1000BASE-T以太网。您还拥有FTP静态图片和视频上传以及标准的镜头绑定拍摄功能。', '4K 120fps帧速率电影：α1支持高帧速率内部4K电影录制，最高可达120fps，可实现流畅、富有表现力的慢动作播放，最高达5倍。可与Long-GOP或Intra（All-I）压缩一起使用的10位4:2:2色度二次抽样，可获得出色的图像质量，而新的图像传感器和BIONZ XR引擎将图像失真降至最低。']

title: 索尼 Alpha a7S III
features_en: ['12.1MP1 Exmor R sensor, optimized for 4K, sensitivity and speed.Bluetooth : version 5.0', 'New BIONZ XR processing engine delivers 8x more processing power2', 'Low noise images with ISO up to 409,6003 and 15 plus stop dynamic range4', 'Up to 4K 120p5 10-bit 4:2:2 and full pixel readout in all rec. modes', 'Up to 4K 120p5 in XAVC S (AVC), XAVC HS (HEVC) and XAVC S-I (All-I)', 'Video capture resolution: 4K UHD 2160p. Operating Temperature- 32 - 104 degrees F / 0 - 40 degrees C', 'First time ever in an Alpha camera - S-Cinetone picture profile for cinematic look tone and color in video']
description: ['Introducing the Alpha 7S III – a new milestone in sensitivity, speed and image supremacy. Featuring an all-new 12.1MP backside illuminated full-frame sensor with twice the readout speed for ultra-clean low-light images up to ISO 409,600, 15+ stops dynamic range and 3x reduction in rolling shutter, plus Sony’s acclaimed fast hybrid autofocus with 759 phase detection AF points. A new BIONZ XR processing engine deliver 8x more processing power for up to 120p 4K 10-bit 4:2:2 and full pixel readout in all recording modes.']

features_zh: ['- 12.1MP1 Exmor R 传感器，优化支持4K、感光度和速度。\n- 蓝牙：版本5.0', '新的BIONZ XR处理引擎提供了8倍的处理能力。', '高ISO达到409,6003时产生低噪声图像，具有15档以上的动态范围4。', '在所有录制模式中支持4K 120p、10位深度、4:2:2色度，并且全像素读取。', '- 最高支持4K 120p5的XAVC S (AVC)、XAVC HS (HEVC)和XAVC S-I (All-I)', '视频拍摄分辨率：4K UHD 2160p。工作温度：32 - 104华氏度 / 0 - 40摄氏度', '首次在Alpha相机中 - S-Cinetone图片配置文件，用于视频中的电影般外观的色调和颜色']

title: 索尼 Alpha 7R IV
features_en: ['Processor: Advanced Detail Reproduction Technology and Area-specific Noise Reduction - both features of Sony’s BIONZ X image processing engine - have been carefully tuned to maximize the performance of a sensor that offers approximately 1.5 times more resolution than the highly acclaimed Alpha 7R III, achieving extremely fine, realistic reproduction of textures and details', 'Dynamic Range: The Alpha 7R IV A boasts an impressive 15-stop dynamic range at low sensitivities, resulting in smooth natural gradations ranging from deep shadows to highlights, and utilizes algorithms from many of the latest Alpha cameras to maintain outstanding color reproduction', 'Low Noise at High ISO: A standard ISO range that extends from ISO 100 up to ISO 32000 with undiminished quality is expandable to ISO 50 to ISO 102400 for still images, make it possible to achieve optimum image quality in just about any light. Noise is effectively minimized even at high sensitivities, maintaining excellent image quality even with this sensor’s high pixel count', 'Wireless PC Remote Function: You can easily operate the newly supported wireless PC Remote functions on the Sony a7R IV A Mirrorless via Wi-Fi (2.4 GHz/5 GHz selectable). With wireless PC Remote functions, you can remotely control the camera settings or send captured images to the camera while shooting. This cable-free setting allows for maximum shooting freedom for both indoor and outdoor shooting sessions']
description: ['The', 'Sony a7R IV A', 'features the 35mm full-frame back-illuminated CMOS image sensor with 61MP effective pixels, delivering depth and dimension that was once only available in medium-format cameras. The back-illuminated structure and effective area specific noise reduction techniques combine to deliver an extraordinary blend of low noise and high sensitivity for enormous imaging potential.', '16-Bit Processing and 14-Bit RAW Output', 'Image sensor output is processed in 16-bit form by the front-end LSI and BIONZ X image processing engine before being output as compressed or uncompressed 14-bit RAW files that have smoother, more natural gradations for higher overall image quality.', 'Speed Up to 10fps with AF/AE Tracking', 'An advanced mechanical shutter unit and updated image processing algorithms allow the innovative new full-frame Alpha 7R IV A to shoot full 61MP resolution images at up to 10 fps with continuous and accurate autofocus and auto exposure (AF/AE) tracking for up to approximately seven seconds in JPEG and RAW, and approx. three times as long in 26.2MPii APS-C crop mode.', 'Real-Time Autofocus Tracking', 'Real-time Tracking is a state-of-the-art feature that employs artificial intelligence to tenaciously track moving subjects when shooting stills or movies.', 'Bundle Includes:', 'Sony a7R IV A 61MP Full-frame Mirrorless Camera (Body Only, New Version)', 'Sony a7R IV A 61MP Full-frame Mirrorless Camera (Body Only, New Version)', 'Sigma 35mm f/1.4 DG HSM ART Lens for Sony E', 'Sigma 35mm f/1.4 DG HSM ART Lens for Sony E', 'The Corel Photo, Video, and Art Suite v.3.0', 'The Corel Photo, Video, and Art Suite v.3.0', 'Kingston Nucleum 7-in-1 USB Type-C Hub', 'Kingston Nucleum 7-in-1 USB Type-C Hub', 'Koah PRO Sony NP-FZ100 Two-Pack Rechargeable 2000mAh Battery and Dual Charger', 'Koah PRO Sony NP-FZ100 Two-Pack Rechargeable 2000mAh Battery and Dual Charger', 'Sony LCSSC8 Lightweight System Case for Alpha Camera and Lenses - Black', 'Sony LCSSC8 Lightweight System Case for Alpha Camera and Lenses - Black', '2 x Kingston 64GB SDHC Canvas Select Plus Memory Card', '2 x Kingston 64GB SDHC Canvas Select Plus Memory Card']
details: {'sensor_type': 'Full-frame', 'resolution': '61 MP', 'autofocus_system': '567-point phase-detection AF and 425-point contrast-detection AF', 'lens_compatibility': 'Sony E-mount', 'image_stabilization': '5-axis in-body image stabilization', 'video_capabilities': '4K at 30fps, 1080p at 120fps', 'electronic_viewfinder': '5.76 million-dot OLED', 'battery_life': '670 shots per charge', 'connectivity_options': 'Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, USB, HDMI', 'weight': '665 grams (1.46 pounds)', 'dimensions': '128.9 x 96.4 x 77.5 mm (5.08 x 3.8 x 3.05 inches)', 'continuous_shooting_speed': '10 fps', 'low_light_performance': 'Excellent, with ISO up to 32000', 'dynamic_range': '15 stops', 'iso_range': '100-32000 (expandable to 50-102400)', 'color': 'Black', 'max_shutter_speed': '1/8000s', 'min_shutter_speed': '30s'}
features_zh: ['处理器：索尼 BIONZ X 图像处理引擎的先进细节再现技术和区域特定降噪 - 都经过精心调校，以最大化传感器的性能，比备受好评的 Alpha 7R III 高约1.5倍的分辨率，实现了极其细致、逼真的纹理和细节再现。', '动态范围: Alpha 7R IV A在低感光度下具有令人印象深刻的15档动态范围，实现从深影到高光的平滑自然渐变，利用了许多最新Alpha相机的算法，保持出色的色彩复制。', '高ISO下低噪音：标准ISO范围为ISO 100至ISO 32000，质量不减，可扩展至ISO 50至ISO 102400用于静态图像，使在任何光线下实现最佳图像质量成为可能。即使在高ISO下，噪音被有效地最小化，保持卓越的图像质量，即使具有该传感器高像素计数。', '无线电脑遥控功能：您可以通过Wi-Fi（可选择2.4 GHz/5 GHz）轻松操作Sony a7R IV A无反光镜相机上新支持的无线电脑遥控功能。借助无线电脑遥控功能，您可以在拍摄时远程控制相机设置或将拍摄图像发送到相机。这种无线设置不需要电缆，为室内和室外拍摄提供了最大的拍摄自由度。']

title: 索尼 Alpha 7R III
features_en: ['Advanced still functions and performance: Sony Professional Mirrorless Digital Camera is equipped with the latest technology, 42.4 MP3 full-frame Exmor R CMOS sensor, high-speed BIONZ X image processing engine, wide standard ISO 100-32000 range, 5-axis in-camera image stabiliser faithfully reproduce details & make it perfect for photography.', 'Exceptional Resolution & High Speed Shooting: Sony a7R III realizes the level of image quality that surpasses the expectation. 35 mm full-frame back-illuminated CMOS sensor with 42.2 megapixels enables to attain expressive prowess. Exceptional High-speed continuous shooting of up to 10fps α7R III with AF/AE tracking imaging maintains high image quality that is perfect for your creative trimming.', 'Fast Hybrid AF: AF performance is improved by inheriting the AF performance used in the α9. The AF algorithm inherited from the α9 accounts for two times more precise AF tracking for continuous shooting, even of complex or sudden movement. 399 phase-detection AF points plus 425 densely positioned contrast-detection AF points improve focus that might otherwise be unachievable. With the a7R III, Eye AF evolves with two times.', 'Confident & Comfortable Operation: A new multi-selector lets you shift point of focus quickly and intuitively to avoid missing moving subjects. The surface texture is changed to enhance button response for easier and more confident operation, in reply to pro users requests. These improvements enhance your concentration on shutter release to "capture the moment" instantly.']
description: ['Sony A7R III 35 mm full-frame Interchangeable Lens camera with autofocus', 'Sony A7R III brings the new world of imaging with resolution, sensitivity, dynamic range, processing speed, and a further-enhanced shooting response. It packs pro-style operability into a strong, compact body to give greater flexibility to take brilliant shots in any situation.', 'Features & Specifications', '42MP Full-Frame Exmor R BSI CMOS Sensor', '42MP Full-Frame Exmor R BSI CMOS Sensor', 'BIONZ X Image Processor & Front-End LSI', 'BIONZ X Image Processor & Front-End LSI', '399-Point AF System & 10 fps Shooting', '399-Point AF System & 10 fps Shooting', '3.69m-Dot Tru-Finder OLED EVF', '3.69m-Dot Tru-Finder OLED EVF', '3.0" 1.44m-Dot Tilting Touchscreen LCD', '3.0" 1.44m-Dot Tilting Touchscreen LCD', '5-Axis SteadyShot INSIDE Stabilization', '5-Axis SteadyShot INSIDE Stabilization', 'ISO 102400 & Pixel Shift Multi Shooting', 'ISO 102400 & Pixel Shift Multi Shooting', 'Built-In Wi-Fi/Bluetooth, Dual SD Slots', 'Built-In Wi-Fi/Bluetooth, Dual SD Slots', 'USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-C Port & PC Sync Port', 'USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-C Port & PC Sync Port', 'Video Features', 'UHD 4K30p Video with HLG & S-Log3 Gammas', 'UHD 4K30p Video with HLG & S-Log3 Gammas', 'Support for HDR Content', 'Support for HDR Content', 'Full HD video between 1-120 fps', 'Full HD video between 1-120 fps', 'Enhanced Zebra Function', 'Enhanced Zebra Function', 'Time Code and User Bit Settings', 'Time Code and User Bit Settings', 'Proxy Recording', 'Proxy Recording', 'Essential Bundle Accessories', 'Along with the accessories from Sony, the Sony a1 bundle Includes additional accessories', '64GB SDXC Memory Card', '64GB SDXC Memory Card', 'NP-FZ100 Battery', 'NP-FZ100 Battery', 'Peak Design Slide Ash Strap', 'Peak Design Slide Ash Strap', 'Water-Resistant Gadget Bag', 'Water-Resistant Gadget Bag', 'Monopod', 'Monopod', 'Professional Cleaning Kit', 'Professional Cleaning Kit', 'Dust-Off Blower', 'Dust-Off Blower', 'Micro SD Card Reader', 'Micro SD Card Reader']

details: {'sensor_type': 'Full-frame', 'resolution': '42.4 MP', 'autofocus_system': 'Phase Detection, Contrast Detection', 'lens_compatibility': 'Sony E', 'image_stabilization': 'In-body Image Stabilization (IBIS)', 'video_capabilities': '4K at 30fps', 'electronic_viewfinder': '3.69M-dot OLED', 'battery_life': '650 shots (CIPA)', 'connectivity_options': 'Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, NFC, USB, HDMI', 'weight': '657g', 'dimensions': '126.9 x 95.6 x 73.7 mm', 'continuous_shooting_speed': '10 fps', 'low_light_performance': 'Excellent, with ISO up to 102400', 'dynamic_range': '15 stops', 'iso_range': '100-32000 (expandable to 50-102400)', 'color': 'Black', 'max_shutter_speed': '1/8000s', 'min_shutter_speed': '30s'}
features_zh: ['- 先进的静态功能和性能：索尼专业无反光数码相机配备最新技术，42.4 MP3全画幅Exmor R CMOS传感器，高速BIONZ X图像处理引擎，宽广的标准ISO 100-32000范围，5轴内置图像稳定器忠实地再现细节，使其非常适合摄影。', '卓越的解析度与高速拍摄：索尼a7R III实现了超出期望的图像质量水平。具有42.2百万像素的35毫米全画幅背照式CMOS传感器使得可以获得出色的表现能力。α7R III可以以高达10fps的超高速连拍速度进行AF/AE跟踪成像，保持高质量的图像，非常适合您的创意裁剪。', '快速混合自动对焦（Fast Hybrid AF）：由α9相机的自动对焦性能改进。继承自α9的自动对焦算法增加了两倍的精确度，用于连续拍摄时更好地跟踪复杂或突然的移动。399个相位检测自动对焦点加上425个密集分布的对比度检测自动对焦点提高了对焦性能，做到了其他情况下无法实现的对焦。a7R III相机进一步提升了眼部自动对焦技术。', '自信且舒适的操作：全新的多功能选择器让您可以快速直观地转换对焦点，避免错失移动的对象。表面纹理经过改变以增强按键响应，使操作更加轻松自如，以应对专业用户的需求。这些改进提高了您在快门释放时集中注意力，立即“捕捉瞬间”。']

title: 索尼 Alpha 7 IV
features_en: ["Newly developed 33MP1 full-frame back-illuminated CMOS image sensor: Delivering outstanding performance and excellent image quality in both stills and movies, the α7 IV's new 33.0 megapixel Exmor R CMOS image sensor provides high-speed readout, high sensitivity, low noise, and highly accurate color reproduction. The a7 IV and its powerful Exmor R sensor represent a significant evolution of Sony's original image technology, for improvements that go beyond mere numbers.", 'Flagship-level image processing with BIONZ XR: The α7 IV uses the latest image processor to offer greatly enhanced performance, with improved image quality and colour reproduction. Fast processing speeds facilitate comfortable continuous shooting as well as responsive operation while performing data transfers. Impressively low levels of noise are achieved throughout the standard range of ISO 100-51200 (expandable to ISO 50-204800 for stills and ISO 100-102400 for movies).', "Fast Hybrid AF: The Fast Hybrid AF system, combining phase-detection AF and contrast-detection AF, has evolved even further to achieve greater speed, accuracy and tracking performance. With Sony's 4D FOCUS, a wide, dense AF area covers roughly 94% of the image area for both stills and movies with 759 phase-detection AF points. There is Improved Real-time Eye AF & Sony's smart AI-based Real-time Tracking.", "5-axis optical image stabilisation: Up to 5.5-step shutter-speed compensation from the in-body stabilisation unit. The α7 IV's high-precision stabilisation unit and gyro sensors work together with image-stabilisation algorithms to achieve up to 5.5 steps of shutter-speed compensation, to maximise the high-resolution performance of the camera's 33.0MP1 image sensor."]
description: ['Alpha 7 IV (Body) - Full-frame Mirrorless Interchangeable Lens Camera', 'Hybrid 33MP up to 10FPS, up to 4K 60p, 7k oversampled for 4K 30p, 5-axis stabilization', 'With groundbreaking performance in both still and movie recording, the α7 IV is the ideal hybrid, providing breathtaking imagery along with on-the-spot delivery and distribution.', 'Features & Specifications', '33MP full-frame Exmor R? back-illuminated CMOS sensor', '33MP full-frame Exmor R? back-illuminated CMOS sensor', '8x more powerful, next-generation BIONZ XR? image processing engine', '8x more powerful, next-generation BIONZ XR? image processing engine', 'Up to 4K 60p 10-bit 4:2:2 w/ full pixel readout in all rec. formats', 'Up to 4K 60p 10-bit 4:2:2 w/ full pixel readout in all rec. formats', '7K oversampling full-frame 4K 30p 10-bit 4:2:2 w/ no pixel binning', '7K oversampling full-frame 4K 30p 10-bit 4:2:2 w/ no pixel binning', 'Real-time Eye-AF for humans, animals, birds for photo and movie', 'Real-time Eye-AF for humans, animals, birds for photo and movie', 'S-Cinetone, S-Log, HLG, and 10 Creative Look presets in-camera', 'S-Cinetone, S-Log, HLG, and 10 Creative Look presets in-camera', 'Advanced movie features; Focus Map, Breathing Comp., AF Assist', 'Advanced movie features; Focus Map, Breathing Comp., AF Assist', 'UVC/UAC live streaming up to 4K 15p/1080 60p w/ internal recording', 'UVC/UAC live streaming up to 4K 15p/1080 60p w/ internal recording', 'Low noise images w/ ISO up to 204800 and 15+stop dynamic range', 'Low noise images w/ ISO up to 204800 and 15+stop dynamic range', '5-axis in-body image stabilization and Active Mode for handheld movie', '5-axis in-body image stabilization and Active Mode for handheld movie', 'In the Box', 'Sony a7 IV Mirrorless Camera', 'Sony a7 IV Mirrorless Camera', 'Sony NP-FZ100 Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery (2280mAh)', 'Sony NP-FZ100 Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery (2280mAh)', 'AC Adapter and Power Cord', 'AC Adapter and Power Cord', 'Sony ALC-B1EM Body Cap for E-Mount Cameras', 'Sony ALC-B1EM Body Cap for E-Mount Cameras', 'Shoulder Strap', 'Shoulder Strap', 'Accessory Shoe Cap', 'Accessory Shoe Cap', 'Eyepiece Cup', 'Eyepiece Cup', 'USB Type-C to Type-A Cable', 'USB Type-C to Type-A Cable', 'Extra Bundle Accessories Included', 'Backpack', 'Backpack', 'Dust-Off Blower', 'Dust-Off Blower', 'Cleaning Kit', 'Cleaning Kit', 'Micro SD Card Reader', 'Micro SD Card Reader', 'Lexar 64GB SD Card', 'Lexar 64GB SD Card']

details: {'sensor_type': 'Full-frame', 'resolution': '33 MP', 'autofocus_system': 'Phase Detection, Contrast Detection', 'lens_compatibility': 'Sony E', 'image_stabilization': 'Sensor-shift', 'video_capabilities': '2160p, XAVC S', 'electronic_viewfinder': 'Not specified', 'battery_life': 'Not specified', 'connectivity_options': 'USB, Wi-Fi', 'weight': 'Not specified', 'dimensions': 'Not specified', 'continuous_shooting_speed': '10 fps', 'low_light_performance': 'High, ISO up to 102400', 'dynamic_range': 'Not specified', 'iso_range': '50-102400', 'color': 'Black', 'max_shutter_speed': 'Not specified', 'min_shutter_speed': 'Not specified'}
features_zh: ['新开发的3300万像素全画幅背照式CMOS图像传感器： α7 IV 的新33.0万像素 Exmor R CMOS图像传感器在静态图像和视频中提供出色的性能和优异的图像质量，具有高速读出、高灵敏度、低噪声和高度准确的色彩再现。a7 IV 及其强大的Exmor R传感器代表了索尼原始图像技术的重大进化，改进超越了简单的数字。', '具备旗舰级图像处理技术 BIONZ XR：α7 IV采用最新的图像处理器，提供大幅增强的性能，改善了图像质量和色彩再现。快速处理速度实现舒适的连续拍摄，并在执行数据传输时响应迅速。令人印象深刻的低噪声水平贯穿ISO 100-51200的标准范围（可扩展至ISO 50-204800用于静态图像和ISO 100-102400用于视频）。', '快速混合自动对焦（Fast Hybrid AF）：将相位检测自动对焦（phase-detection AF）和对比度检测自动对焦（contrast-detection AF）相结合的快速混合自动对焦系统已经进化到更高的速度、准确性和跟踪性能。搭载索尼的4D FOCUS技术，广泛且密集的对焦区域涵盖图像区域大约94%，适用于静态图像和电影，配备759个相位检测自动对焦点。此外，还拥有改进的实时眼部自动对焦（Real-time Eye AF）和索尼智能基于AI的实时跟踪功能。', '5轴光学防抖：通过机身稳定装置可获得高达5.5档快门速度补偿。α7 IV的高精度稳定装置和陀螺传感器与图像稳定算法一起工作，实现高达5.5档的快门速度补偿，最大限度地发挥相机33.0MP的高分辨率性能。']

title: 索尼 Alpha 7 III
features_en: ['Sony Alpha a7 III Mirrorless Digital Camera Body- 24MP Full-Frame Exmor R BSI CMOS Sensor', 'BIONZ X Image Processor and Front-End LSI', '693-Point Hybrid AF System', 'UHD 4K30p Video with HLG and S-Log3 Gammas', 'Optical zoom: 2.50', 'Video capture resolution: 1080p', 'Max focal length: 70.00', 'Mounting type: Bayonet']
description: ['Distinguished by its updated sensor design, the Alpha a7 III Mirrorless Digital Camera from Sony is a well-rounded camera suitable for both photo and video applications in a variety of working situations. Refined for improved speed and low-light performance, the full-frame 24.2MP Exmor R BSI CMOS sensor and BIONZ X image processor pair to realize an impressive 10 fps continuous shooting rate and improved autofocus performance for faster, more reliable subject tracking along with wide frame coverage. This updated Fast Hybrid AF System employs a combination of 693 phase-detection points and 425 contrast-detection areas for quicker acquirement of focus in a variety of lighting conditions, and also maintains focus on subjects more effectively. In addition to speed and AF, the processing improvements also help to realize greater image clarity and reduced noise throughout the sensitivity range from ISO 100-51200, which can further be expanded to ISO 50-204800.Manufacturer’s Include ItemsSony Alpha a7 III Mirrorless Digital CameraSony FE 28-70mm f3.5-5.6 OSS LensSony NP-FZ100 Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery (2280mAh)Sony AC AdapterMicro-USB CableSony ALC-B1EM Body Cap for E-Mount CamerasAccessory Shoe CapEyepiece CupShoulder Strap Limited 1-Year WarrantyBundle Added Items SanDisk 64GB Extreme PRO UHS-I SDXC Memory Card Professional LED Video Light Led Light DiffusersProfessional camera microphone USB 2.0 SD Memory Card Reader Camera Back Pack Case 7 inches inch Flex Tripod 5 inches Hand Grip for HDSLRs and Video Cameras Professional Video Stabilizing Handle Grip Camera Hand Grip Strap Replacement Battery Microfiber Non-Abrasive Cleaning Cloth']

title: 索尼 Alpha 9 II
features_en: ['SONY ALPHA A9 II: Compact professional cameras mastered for sports photography and photojournalism', 'SUPERIOR SPEED: Fastest 35mm full-frame 24. 2MP stacked Exmore RS CMOS sensor with integrated memory', 'FASTER AUTO FOCUS: Up to 20fps at full resolution with 60 AF/AE tracking calculations per second', 'ADVANCED SUBJECT RECOGNITION: Real-time Tracking and Real-Time Eye AF for humans, animals and movies', 'VOICE MEMO FUNCTION: Attach a voice memo (. wav) to photo files or use voice to text for IPTC data', 'HIGH LUMINANCE VIEWFINDER: Continuous view blackout free OLED True-Finder with 100% frame coverage', 'UPGRADED CONNECTIVITY: High speed 2. 4 or 5 GHz Wi-Fi, up to 1 Gbps Ethernet and secure FTP transfer', '4K RECORDING: Interval shooting, S&Q Motion, 2. 4x oversampling, full pixel readout without binning', 'MORE FEATURES: Touch screen, Bluetooth, image stabilization, anti flicker, dual UHS-II SD card slots', 'Viewfinder Type: Electronic Viewfinder', 'Lens Type: Telephoto']
description: ['Created specifically to support working professionals in the fields of sports photography and photojournalism, the Alpha 9 II delivers unmatched performance including blackout-free continuous shooting at up to 20 frames per second with Auto Focus and Auto Exposure tracking at 60 calculations per second, plus continuous shooting at up to 10 fps with mechanical shutter. Evolved Artificial Intelligence autofocus with Real Time AF tracking for accurate image acquisition and built-in connectivity and file delivery for the professional’s workflow with file transfer over SSL or TLS encryption (FTPS) for increased data security.']

title: 索尼 Alpha 9
features_en: ['Sony Alpha A9 Wi-Fi 4K Digital Camera Body']
description: ['Kit includes:', '? 1) Sony Alpha A9 Wi-Fi 4K Digital Camera Body? 2) Sony LCS-SC8 Soft Carrying Case? 3) Sony RMT-DSLR2 Wireless Remote Shutter Controller? 4) Transcend 128GB SecureDigital SDXC UHS-I Class 10 U3 V30 Memory Card? 5) Transcend USB 3.0 SD & MicroSD Card Reader (SDHC/SDXC/UHS-I) ? 6) Spare NP-FZ100 Battery? 7) Battery Charger for Sony NP-FZ100? 8) Sunpak 61-inch Ultra 6000PG PlatinumPlus Tripod ? 9) Vidpro XM-45 Professional Video Microphone ? 10) PD 150 LED Ultra-Slim Video Light ? 11) Vivitar SF-4000 Auto Bounce Zoom Slave Flash  ? 12) PD HDMI to Micro-HDMI Gold Cable  ? 13) PD 6-Piece Cleaning Kit? 14) Sony LensPen Camera Lens Cleaner ? 15) PD 8 SD / 2 MicroSD Memory Card Case ? 16) PD Universal LCD Screen Protectors? 17) ImageRecall Digital Image Recovery Software', 'The future is yours with the', 'Sony Alpha A9 Digital Camera', '. This system realizes a totally blackout-free viewfinder, plus a high-speed, vibration-free, silent anti-distortion shutter that vastly extends the range of shooting situations.', 'Take more high-resolution pictures faster (up to 95MB/sec.) with this', 'Transcend 128GB SDXC UHS-I Class 10 U3 V30 Memory Card', '.', 'The', 'Transcend USB 3.0 SD & microSD Card Reader', 'is able to transfer images, videos and other files from SD and microSD card formats (SDHC/SDXC/UHS-I/UHS-3).', 'Increase your shooting capacity with this powerful', 'NP-FZ100', 'Lithium-ion rechargeable battery.', 'This', 'Rapid Multi-voltage Charger', "plugs directly in to your wall outlet or your car's 12V outlet, and charges your battery in approximately 60 to 90 minutes.", 'This', '6-piece cleaning kit', 'includes a Hurricane Air Blower, Lens Cleaning Tissues, Lens Cloth, Lens Cleaning Liquid, Brush and Cotton Swabs.']

title: 索尼 Alpha 7C
features_en: ['Image Sensor: Features a 35mm full-frame 24.2MP back-illuminated Exmor R CMOS image sensor with front-end LSI and an updated BIONZ X processing-engine. It achieves high sensitivity and low-noise with an impressive ISO range of ISO 50 to 204800 and massive 15-stop dynamic range. Images are processed in 16-bit form by the front-end LSI and BIONZ X processor before being output as 14-bit RAW data for improved expression of gradations from shadows to highlights', 'Full Pixel Readout: The Alpha a7C is exceptionally capable as a video camera, offering 4K (3840x2160 pixels) video recording across the full width of the full-frame image sensor. In video mode, it uses full pixel readout without pixel binning to collect approximately 2.4x the amount of data required for 4K movies, and then oversamples it to produce high quality 4K footage with exceptional detail and depth', 'Ideal For Vlogging: Features a 3-inch 921K (approx.) touch-sensitive LCD panel with side-opening vari-angle mechanism that affords plenty of monitor positioning freedom for high and low viewpoints as well as waist-level, vertical, and selfie positions. The 2.36 million-dot XGA OLED Tru-Finder electronic viewfinder has the ability to deliver continuous live shooting at up to 8 fps with AF/AE tracking - making it easy to track fast moving subjects', 'USB Type-C Connector: In addition to high speed Wi-Fi and wireless PC connectivity, the Alpha a7C is equipped with a SuperSpeed USB (USB 3.2 Gen 1) USB Type-C connector that supports extremely fast wired data transmission, plus FTP data transfer with background transfer capability, allowing images to be sent to a specified FTP remote server while the photographer is still shooting or reviewing images']
description: ['The', 'Sony Alpha a7C', 'is for creators who demand full-frame quality and performance, but also want a compact lightweight camera they can take anywhere and use for all types of still and video creation. It is world’s smallest and lightest full-frame camera with all the power and performance of a full-frame in a design more akin to APS-C bodies. Thanks to newly-developed devices and construction, including a compact electromagnetic-drive shutter mechanism, a compact 5-axis in-body image stabilization unit and a monocoque magnesium alloy construction, the Alpha a7C redefines the norms of what a full-frame camera can be.', 'Advanced 24.2MP Image Sensor', 'The Alpha a7C features a 35mm full-frame 24.2MP back-illuminated Exmor R CMOS image sensor with front-end LSI and an updated BIONZ X processing-engine. It achieves high sensitivity and low-noise with an impressive ISO range of ISO 50 to 204800 and massive 15-stop dynamic range. Images are processed in 16-bit form by the front-end LSI and BIONZ X processor before being output as 14-bit RAW data for improved expression of gradations from shadows to highlights.', 'Bundle Includes:', 'Sony Alpha a7C Full-Frame Compact Mirrorless Camera Body (Silver)', 'Sony Alpha a7C Full-Frame Compact Mirrorless Camera Body (Silver)', 'Sony FE 50mm f/1.8 Lens', 'Sony FE 50mm f/1.8 Lens', 'Two-Pack Rechargeable 2000mAh Battery and Dual Charger', 'Two-Pack Rechargeable 2000mAh Battery and Dual Charger', 'Roebling Street Camera System Gadget Bag with Accessory & Cleaning Kit', 'Roebling Street Camera System Gadget Bag with Accessory & Cleaning Kit', 'Software Suite v3: Paint Shop Pro 2019, Video Studio SE, After Shot Pro 3, Painter Essentials 7', 'Software Suite v3: Paint Shop Pro 2019, Video Studio SE, After Shot Pro 3, Painter Essentials 7', '64GB Ultra SDXC UHS-I 100MB/s Memory Card', '64GB Ultra SDXC UHS-I 100MB/s Memory Card']
details: {'sensor_type': 'Full-frame', 'resolution': '24.2 MP', 'autofocus_system': 'Contrast Detection', 'lens_compatibility': 'Sony E', 'image_stabilization': 'In-body Image Stabilization (IBIS)', 'video_capabilities': '4K at 30fps, 1080p at 120fps', 'electronic_viewfinder': '2.36M-dot OLED EVF', 'battery_life': '740 shots per charge', 'connectivity_options': 'Wi-Fi, USB, HDMI', 'weight': '1 Pound (approximately 454 grams)', 'dimensions': '18 x 14 x 10.5 inches', 'continuous_shooting_speed': '8 fps', 'low_light_performance': 'Excellent, with ISO up to 204800', 'dynamic_range': '15 stops', 'iso_range': '50-204800', 'color': 'Silver', 'max_shutter_speed': '1/8000s', 'min_shutter_speed': '30s'}
features_zh: ['图像传感器: 采用全画幅35mm 2420万像素背照式Exmor R CMOS图像传感器，配备前端LSI和更新版的BIONZ X处理引擎。它实现了高灵敏度和低噪声，ISO范围广泛，从ISO 50到204800，动态范围达到15档。在被输出为14位RAW数据前，图像由前端LSI和BIONZ X处理器以16位形式进行处理，以增强从阴影到高光的色阶表现。', '全像素读取：Alpha a7C在视频摄像方面非常强大，可以在全画幅图像传感器的全宽度上进行4K（3840x2160像素）视频录制。在视频模式下，它使用全像素读取而非像素合并，收集大约比4K电影所需的数据量多大约2.4倍，并对其进行过采样，以产生具有出色细节和深度的高质量4K视频素材。', '适合vlog：具有3英寸921K（约）触摸屏LCD面板，侧开变角机构，为高低观点、腰部、垂直和自拍位置提供广泛的监视位置自由度。236万像素XGA OLED Tru-Finder电子取景器具有连续实时拍摄功能，最高可达8 fps，并带有AF/AE跟踪功能 - 可轻松跟踪快速移动的对象。', 'USB Type-C连接器：除了高速Wi-Fi和无线PC连接，Alpha a7C配备了一个支持超高速有线数据传输的SuperSpeed USB（USB 3.2 Gen 1）USB Type-C连接器，此外还支持使用后台传输功能进行FTP数据传输，允许摄影师在拍摄或查看图片时将图像发送到指定的FTP远程服务器。']

title: 尼康 Z9
features_en: ['45.7MP Stacked CMOS sensor and EXPEED 7 image processing', 'Fast powerful AF that can keep up with the fastest subjects and frame rates', 'Subject detection uses deep learning to automatically detect and track people, cats, dogs, birds, cars, motorcycles, bicycles, trains and planes in stills and video with no menu changes', 'Capture 45.7MP stills at 20 or 30 fps; 120 fps stills at 11MP, all with full AF and AE, and no viewfinder blackout']
description: ['45.7-megapixel stacked CMOS sensor Nikon Z mount 5-in 3690k-dot (Quad VGA) OLED electronic viewfinder AF scene detection system 8K Video resolution and internal recording Fast 120 fps shooting Dual card slots Fast scanning speeds Integrated vertical grip Included Nikon FTZ II Mount Adapter']
details: {'sensor_type': 'Full-frame', 'resolution': '45.7 MP', 'autofocus_system': 'Contrast Detection', 'lens_compatibility': 'Nikon Z, Nikon 1', 'image_stabilization': 'In-body', 'video_capabilities': '8k at 30fps, 4k at 120fps', 'electronic_viewfinder': '3690k-dot OLED', 'battery_life': '740 shots per charge', 'connectivity_options': 'Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, USB, HDMI', 'weight': '4.65 Pounds', 'dimensions': '9.1 x 9.1 x 9.1 inches', 'continuous_shooting_speed': '20 fps', 'low_light_performance': 'Excellent with high ISO performance', 'dynamic_range': '14.7 stops', 'iso_range': '64-25600 (expandable to 32-102400)', 'color': 'Black', 'max_shutter_speed': '1/32000s', 'min_shutter_speed': '30s'}
features_zh: ['45.7MP 堆栈式 CMOS 传感器和 EXPEED 7 图像处理', '快速强大的自动对焦系统，可以跟上最快的主体和帧率', '主体检测利用深度学习自动检测和跟踪静止图像和视频中的人员、猫、狗、鸟、汽车、摩托车、自行车、火车和飞机，无需更改菜单。', '以全自动对焦（AF）和自动曝光（AE）的模式，可于20或30 fps下拍摄4500万像素的静态图像；以全自动对焦（AF）和自动曝光（AE）的模式，可于120 fps下拍摄1100万像素的静态图像，同时不会有取景器黑屏。']

title: 尼康 Z8
features_en: ['45.7MP stacked CMOS sensor and EXPEED 7 processing engine.', 'Nikon’s most advanced autofocus system. AF algorithm developed using deep learning technology, detects focus as low as -9 EV, combines subject detection and 3D tracking. Detects and tracks people, dogs, cats, birds, cars, bikes, motorcycles, trains and planes.', 'Internal 8K/60p and 4K/120p video. Internal 12-bit N-RAW and ProRes RAW recording.', 'Flexible still image file formats. RAW 14-bit, High Efficiency RAW, 10-bit HEIF and JPEG 8-bit.', 'Beautiful portraits made easy. Skin Softening, Portrait Impression Balance and Improved White Balance features. Blazing fast continuous shooting. 20, 30, 60 and 120 fps shooting options.']
description: ['The ultimate hybrid camera. Powerful video and still photography capabilities. Video features include 12-bit 8K/60p and 4K/120p RAW plus 10-bit ProRes 422 HQ internal video recording; Photography features include a 45.7MP stacked CMOS sensor, a silent, vibration-free electronic shutter, 120 fps burst shooting and a blackout-free viewfinder. Fast, accurate AF with subject detection powered by deep learning. Professional build and operation. Smart connectivity. All in a brilliant compact, lightweight modular design.']

features_zh: ['45.7MP 堆栈式CMOS传感器和EXPEED 7 处理引擎。', '尼康最先进的自动对焦系统。使用深度学习技术开发的AF算法，可以检测至低至-9 EV的对焦，结合主体检测和3D跟踪。可以检测和跟踪人、狗、猫、鸟、汽车、自行车、摩托车、火车和飞机。', '内部支持8K/60p和4K/120p视频录制。内部支持12位N-RAW和ProRes RAW录制。', '- 灵活的静态图像文件格式: RAW 14位、高效RAW、10位HEIF和JPEG 8位。', '美丽的肖像轻松实现。柔化肌肤、肖像印象平衡和改进的白平衡功能。极速连拍。20、30、60和120帧拍摄选项。']

title: 尼康 Z7 II
features_en: ['Nikon Z 7II FX-Format Mirrorless Camera(International Model)-45.7MP FX-Format BSI CMOS Sensor', 'Dual EXPEED 6 Image Processors', 'UHD 4K60 Video', 'N-Log and 10-Bit HDMI Out', '10 fps Cont. Shooting', 'ISO 64-25600', '493-Point Phase-Detect AF System', '3.6m-Dot OLED Electronic Viewfinder', '3.2 inch 2.1m-Dot Tilting Touchscreen LCD', '5-Axis In-Body Vibration Reduction', 'Dual Memory Card Slots', 'A 45.7MP BSI CMOS sensor is used for high-resolution shooting, impressive low-light quality, and fast readout speeds to benefit continuous shooting, movies, and time-lapse recording. The back-illuminated design of the sensor affords noticeably cleaner high-sensitivity output for reduced noise when working at high ISO values, up to a native ISO 25600, as well as vivid and smooth quality at sensitivities as low as ISO 64.']
description: ['Improved processing, greater versatility, but familiar in design, the Nikon Z 7II takes everything that was great from the original and ups its capabilities even more. features_zh: ['尼康 Z 7II FX-格式无反相机(国际版)-45.7MP FX-格式BSI CMOS 传感器', '双 EXPEED 6 图像处理器', '超高清4K60视频', 'N-Log和10位HDMI输出', '持续拍摄速度：10帧/秒', 'ISO 64-25600\n感光度 64-25600', '493点位相位检测自动对焦系统', '3.6m像素有机发光二极管电子取景器', '3.2英寸 2.1百萬像素可翻轉觸控屏幕LCD', '5轴机身防抖', '双卡槽设计', '- 使用了一颗4500万像素的BSI CMOS传感器，可实现高分辨率拍摄，出色的低光质量以及快速读取速度，有利于连拍、拍摄电影和延时录制。传感器的背照式设计显著改善了高感光度输出的清晰度，使高ISO值下的噪点减少，原生ISO可达25600，并且在最低ISO 64的感光度下也能呈现生动、平滑的画质。']

title: 尼康 Z6 II
features_en: ['Mirrorless versatility on a whole new level', '24.5MP BSI resolution that excels in low light', '14 FPS suitable for fast action', '4K UHD Video performance at its best', 'Full frame', 'Full pixel readout', 'Full featured 4K UHD Video', 'Top of the line video performance with 4K UHD 60p using full pixel readout and a host of outstanding features for serious videographers', 'Subject acquisition with speed and precision', '3.5x more buffer capacity than the original Z 6', 'Faster continuous shooting', 'Improved AF performance and functionality', 'Dual card slots (CFexpress/XQD + UHS-II SD)', 'Flexibility and peace of mind when shooting important moments or on assignment, such as wedding and event photography', 'Comfortable', 'Durable', 'Intuitive', 'Z 6II’s exterior and interior have been thoughtfully designed to be handled and used with max comfort and ease of operation', 'Vertical Grip Ready', 'Now compatible with the new vertical battery grip for those in need of more power and easier shutter operation when shooting vertically', 'USB-C constant power and charging', 'Never run low on power during livestreams, video shoots and timelapses', 'One mount accepts them all', 'Compatible with a growing line of NIKKOR Z lenses as well as approx. 360 F-mount NIKKOR lenses with FTZ mount adapter (sold separately)', 'Optical zoom: 2.9 multiplier_x', 'Video capture resolution: 2160p', 'Max focal length: 70.0 millimeters']
description: ["'Do it all with this versatile full frame mirrorless hybrid that excels in speed, image quality and video performance. Everything a hybrid still and video mirrorless camera is meant to be. High-speed shooting with the buffer capacity to match. 4K Ultra HD video at 60p. 273-point Hybrid AF system with more options. Outstanding low-light capabilities. Dual processors. Dual card slots. Wireless connectivity with smartphones and laptops. Tons of creative features and that’s just the beginning. Pairing the 24.5MP Z 6II with the versatile NIKKOR Z 24-70mm f/4 S zoom lens, you’ll get a constant f/4 designed to be shot wide-open with smooth, quiet focusing. This high resolution lens is ideal for capturing wide views, close-ups and everything in between."]

title: 尼康 Z6
features_en: ['Large, full frame Z mount for Revolutionary optical performance', 'Nikon-designed 24. 5MP backside illuminated image sensor', '273-Point on-sensor Phase detect AF system', 'Up to 12 fps; 4K Ultra-HD video; 6K time-lapse; 1080P/120Fps slow motion', 'Compatible with NIKKOR Z lenses, over 360 F-mount NIKKOR lenses']
description: ["The all-around camera for those seeking an ideal balance between resolution, speed and low-light performance. 12 fps 12-bit RAW or JPEG shooting. 4K Ultra HD video with full pixel readout. Brilliant low-light performance Up to ISO 51, 200 native. All combined with the advantages of a lightweight mirrorless design, a revolutionary new full-frame lens mount and matched lenses and seamless integration with Nikon DSLR system-including the F-mount NIKKOR lenses you love. The Z6 is a camera that works as hard as you do. The Z6 is perhaps the most adaptable camera we've ever created. It's at the sweet spot of speed, resolution and low-light performance. All combined with the advantages of a lightweight mirrorless design, a revolutionary new full-frame lens mount with matched lenses and seamless integration with Nikon DSLR system-including the F-mount NIKKOR lenses you love. This is mirrorless versatility as only Nikon could create."]

title: 尼康 Z5
features_en: ['Nikon Z5 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Import Model)- 24.3MP FX-Format CMOS Sensor, EXPEED 6 Image Processor, UHD 4K and Full HD Video Recording, 3.6m-Dot OLED Electronic Viewfinder, 3.2" 1.04m-Dot Tilting Touchscreen LCD, 5-Axis Sensor-Shift Vibration Reduction, ISO 100-51200, Up to 4.5 fps Shooting, Built-In Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, Dual SD UHS-II Card Slots', 'Full-frame, FX-format 24.3MP CMOS sensor is paired with an EXPEED 6 image processor to provide a versatile mixture of high sensitivity, nuanced image quality, and fast overall performance. A native sensitivity range from ISO 100-51200 permits working in a broad array of lighting conditions and can be further expanded up to ISO 102400 for extreme low-light conditions']
description: ['Compact and capable, the Nikon Z5 is an FX-format mirrorless camera with a well-rounded feature-set to suit both photo and video needs. Its 24.3MP CMOS sensor and EXPEED 6 processor afford wide sensitivity to ISO 51200, quick shooting at 4.5 fps, and UHD 4K video at 30 fps. A 3.69m-dot electronic finder is present for comfortable eye-level viewing.Built-in SnapBridge connectivity to enable seamless transfer of low-resolution imagery as well as remote shooting capabilities. BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) and Wi-Fi enables communication between the camera and a smart device and, additionally, the mobile device can remotely trigger the shutter and display a live view image.Manufacturer Included ItemsNikon Z5 Mirrorless Digital CameraNikon NIKKOR Z DX 24-50mm f/4-6.3 VR LensAF-P 70-300mm F/4.5-6.3 ED VR LensFTZ Mount Adapter Nikon EN-EL15 Rechargeable Lithium-Ion BatteryNikon MH-25 Battery ChargerNikon UC-E24 USB Type-A Male to Type-B Micro Male CableNikon AN-DC19 Camera StrapNikon BF-N1 Body CapDK-29 Rubber EyecupBundle Added ItemsSanDisk 64GB Extreme PRO UHS-I SDXC Memory CardReplacement Battery for EN-EL15(Spare) Back Pack Case50 inch Tripod 52mm Ultra Violet (UV) Filter52mm Circular Polarizer (CPL) Filter 52mm Fluorescent (FLD) Filter Lens Cleaning PenLens Dust Blower3pc LCD Screen ProtectorGrace Photo Lens Cleaning Cloth']

features_zh: ['尼康Z5无反数码相机（进口型号）- 24.3MP FX格式CMOS传感器，EXPEED 6图像处理器，UHD 4K和全高清视频录制，3.6百万点OLED电子取景器，3.2英寸104万点可倾斜触摸屏LCD，5轴传感器位移抖动补偿，ISO 100-51200，最高每秒4.5帧连拍，内置Wi-Fi和蓝牙，双SD UHS-II卡槽', '全画幅，FX格式24.3MP CMOS传感器与EXPEED 6图像处理器配对，提供了高灵敏度、细腻图像质量和快速性能的多功能组合。原生ISO 100-51200的灵敏度范围可在广泛的照明条件下工作，并可进一步扩展至ISO 102400用于极端低光条件。']

title: 尼康 Z50
features_en: ['Nikon Z50 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Import Model)- 20.9MP DX-Format CMOS Sensor, EXPEED 6 Image Processor, UHD 4K and Full HD Video Recording, 2.36m-Dot OLED Electronic Viewfinder, 3.2" 1.04m-dot LCD screen, Built-in SnapBridge connectivity, In-Camera Image Editing, BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) and Wi-Fi enabled', 'DX-format 20.9MP CMOS sensor is paired with the EXPEED 6 image processor to provide a versatile mixture of high sensitivity, nuanced image quality, and fast overall performance. At native values, a sensitivity range from ISO 100-51200 permits working in a broad array of lighting conditions, and can be further expanded up to ISO 204800 for extreme low-light conditions.', 'Capable of recording more than just stills, the Z50 supports UHD 4K video recording at up to 30 fps and Full HD recording at up to 120 fps, for slow-motion effects, along with the ability to save movie files to the in-camera memory cards or to an optional external recorder via HDMI out. In-camera time-lapse shooting is also possible with the ability to produce a finished UHD 4K video file directly from the camera.']
description: ['Nikon Z50 is a DX-format mirrorless digital camera revolving around the versatile Z Mount. Capable in both stills and video realms, the Z50 features a 20.9MP CMOS sensor and EXPEED 6 image processor, , and notable low-light performance to ISO 51200. For video shooters, UHD 4K is supported up to 30 fps along with Full HD recording at up to 120 fps for slow-motion playback.', 'A large 3.2" 1.04m-dot LCD screen is available for bright, clear, and vivid image playback and live view shooting. The screen has a 180° flip-under tilting design, which benefits front-facing selfie captures', 'A large 3.2" 1.04m-dot LCD screen is available for bright, clear, and vivid image playback and live view shooting. The screen has a 180° flip-under tilting design, which benefits front-facing selfie captures', '3.6m-dot electronic finder is present for comfortable eye-level viewing. It has a 1.02x magnification and uses NIKKOR optics to guarantee a sharp, clear image.', '3.6m-dot electronic finder is present for comfortable eye-level viewing. It has a 1.02x magnification and uses NIKKOR optics to guarantee a sharp, clear image.', 'Built-in SnapBridge connectivity to enable seamless transfer of low-resolution imagery as well as remote shooting capabilities. BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) and Wi-Fi enables communication between the camera and a smart device and, additionally, the mobile device can remotely trigger the shutter and display a live view image.', 'Built-in SnapBridge connectivity to enable seamless transfer of low-resolution imagery as well as remote shooting capabilities. details: {'sensor_type': 'APS-C', 'resolution': '20.9 MP', 'autofocus_system': 'Contrast Detection', 'lens_compatibility': 'Nikon Z, Nikon F', 'image_stabilization': 'None', 'video_capabilities': '4K at 30fps, 1080p', 'electronic_viewfinder': 'Electronic, 3.2 Inches, LCD, tilting', 'battery_life': 'Not specified', 'connectivity_options': 'Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, USB, HDMI', 'weight': '13.93 Ounces', 'dimensions': '4.98 x 2.36 x 3.68 inches', 'continuous_shooting_speed': '30 fps', 'low_light_performance': 'ISO 100-51200', 'dynamic_range': 'Not specified', 'iso_range': '100-51200', 'color': 'Black', 'max_shutter_speed': 'Not specified', 'min_shutter_speed': '30 seconds'}
features_zh: ['尼康 Z50 无反光数字相机（进口型号）- 20.9MP DX-格式CMOS传感器，EXPEED 6 图像处理器，UHD 4K 和全高清视频录制，2.36m-Dot OLED 电子取景器，3.2 英寸 1.04m-dot 液晶屏，内置 SnapBridge 连通性，相机内图像编辑，BLE（低功耗蓝牙）和 Wi-Fi 功能', 'DX格式20.9MP CMOS传感器与EXPEED 6图像处理器配对，提供多功能的高灵敏度、细致的图像质量和快速的整体性能。在原生数值下，ISO 100-51200的灵敏度范围允许在广泛的光照条件下使用，并且可以进一步扩展至ISO 204800以应对极端低光条件。', '支持UHD 4K视频录制，最高可达30帧每秒，以及全高清录制，最高可达每秒120帧，用于慢动作效果。用户可以将电影文件保存到相机内存卡中，或通过HDMI输出接口保存到可选的外部录像机中。同时，相机还支持机内延时摄影，能直接从相机生成UHD 4K成品视频文件。']

title: 尼康 Z30
features_en: ["Designed for creators, vloggers and streamers: Nikon's easy to use Z 30 mirrorless 4K camera with a versatile 16-50mm wide-angle zoom lens", 'Pro-grade video quality: Crisp 4K resolution, autofocus with eye tracking for people and pets, beautifully blurred backgrounds, outstanding low-light performance and rock-steady image stabilization', 'Vlogger essentials: Flip out touchscreen selfie monitor, built-in stereo microphone with adjustable sensitivity, red REC light and smartphone app for controlling the camera with a compatible phone', 'Easy live streaming: Plug and play webcam operation, smooth Full HD 60p streaming over USB-C, 4K 30p streaming over HDMI and constant power over USB-C', "A kit that grows with you: Compatible with Nikon's entire line of exceptional NIKKOR Z lenses, from fast primes to macro lenses, so you can expand your capabilities over time"]
description: ['Move beyond the smartphone camera vibe and take your video quality to the next level. The Nikon Z 30 mirrorless 4K digital camera with a 16-50mm lens is a user-friendly upgrade with a cinematic look and feel, spectacular video quality and features designed for creators, vloggers, influencers, and streamers. TechRadar rated it a Best Camera For Vlogging, calling it “A compact and intuitive tool for novice vloggers.” The Z 30 is the smallest camera in Nikon’s Z series, so it’s easy to use handheld or on a tabletop tripod. It has a flip-out screen with touchscreen control to ensure you’re always in frame, along with a convenient smartphone app that lets you control the camera remotely. The included NIKKOR Z DX 16-50mm f/3.5-6.3 VR wide-angle zoom lens has powerful image stabilization to keep your shots steady. Fast, reliable autofocus with several AF Modes can adjust to the quick shifts in detail found in unboxing videos, how-to’s, gaming streams, video tours, and tutorials. Plus, with eye-detection autofocus, the Z 30 can automatically track the eyes and faces of humans, cats or dogs and keep focus right where you want it. If the Z 30 is your entryway into Nikon Z series products, rest assured you can upgrade your lenses or add an external mic along the way to boost the quality of your content. And to help you make that step, Nikon also offers a Creator’s Accessory Kit with tripod, microphone, and remote (sold separately). When you buy from a Nikon Authorized Dealer, you also get the peace of mind of a limited one-year warranty from Nikon Inc.']

features_zh: ['专为创作者、视频博主和直播主设计：尼康易于使用的Z 30无反4K相机，配备多功能的16-50mm广角变焦镜头', '专业级视频质量：清晰的4K分辨率，具备针对人和宠物的眼动追踪自动对焦，美丽虚化背景，出色的低光性能和稳定图像防抖。', '摄影博主必备：可翻转触摸屏自拍监视器，内置立体声麦克风并具有可调灵敏度，红色REC指示灯，同时配备智能手机应用程序，可通过兼容手机控制相机', '易于直播：即插即用的网络摄像头操作，通过USB-C流畅的全高清60p直播，通过HDMI进行的4K 30p直播以及通过USB-C持续供电', '一个与你共同成长的套装：与尼康全线出色的尼克尔Z镜头兼容，从快速定焦到微距镜头，让你可以随着时间不断扩展你的能力']

title: 佳能 EOS M
features_en: ['18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor, DIGIC 5 Image Processor, ISO 100–12800; expandable to 25600 (H)', 'Hybrid CMOS AF and Multi Shot Noise Reduction', 'EOS Full HD Movie mode with Movie Servo AF for continuous focus tracking of moving subjects', 'Compatible with Canon EF and EF-S lenses (Optional EF Lens Adapter is required)', 'Compatibility with SD/SDHC/SDXC memory cards, including new Ultra High Speed (UHS-I) cards']
description: ['Product Description', 'Inspired by EOS technology, Canon developed the new EOS M Digital Camera. Canon introduced the market to Full HD video capture with smooth, quiet continuous autofocus made possible by Movie Servo AF and STM lenses, advanced CMOS sensor technology, and the processing power of DIGIC 5. The EOS M Digital Camera leverages these key technologies to deliver high-quality moving and still images with creativity provided by Canon’s extensive family of interchangeable lenses.Sensor Type / Size CMOS, 22.3 x 14.9 mm.', 'From the Manufacturer', "True HD Performance | EOS Full HD Movie Mode with Movie Servo AF For those looking to capture superb quality Full HD video, the EOS M Digital Camera offers a number of advantages. Offering a large APS-C sized sensor, the camera is able to deliver shallow depth-of-field for achieving impressive cine-style results and the ability to capture clean, high-quality video, even under very low-light conditions.\xa0\xa0  With the optional Mount Adapter EF-EOS M, the camera is also compatible with Canon's extensive family of EF lenses for boundless creativity. \xa0 Capable of shooting in a number of recording sizes and frame rates, the EOS M Digital Camera continues Canon's tradition of performance, quality and simplicity.\xa0 The EOS M Digital Camera enables easy manual control of focus and exposure. It also automatically splits files greater than 4GB (FAT specifications) for extended recording without interruption. \xa0 Movie Servo AF allows continuous autofocus tracking of moving subjects while recording video.\xa0 When shooting video with one of Canon’s new STM lenses, Movie Servo AF takes advantage of the lens’ stepping motor for smooth and quiet continuous AF.  Resolution & Recording Sizes Frame Rates Recording Time Based on 8 GB Memory Card", 'Full HD 1920 x 1080 16:9 format', '30 fps (29.97)', 'Maximum Recording Time', '29 min. 59 sec.', '25 fps – PAL standard', 'Total Recording Time (approximately)', '1920 x 1080 (Full HD)', '22 min.', '24 fps (23.976)', '1280 x 720 (HD)', '22 min.', 'HD 1280 x 720 16:9 format', '60 fps (59.94)', '640 x 480 (SD)', '1 hr. 32 min.', '50 fps – PAL standard', 'Recording Time Based on 16 GB Memory Card', 'Standard Definition (SD) 640 x 480', '30 fps (29.97)', 'Maximum Recording Time', '2', '9 min. 59 sec.', '25 fps – PAL standard', 'Total Recording Time (approximately)', '1920 x 1080 (Full HD)', '44 min.', '1280 x 720 (HD)', '44 min.', '640 x 480 (SD)', '3 hr. 4 min.', "Built-in stereo microphone, manual audio level adjustment The EOS M Digital Camera has an internal stereo microphone for high-quality audio capture and a wind filter feature to reduce wind noise when shooting outdoors. Sound recording levels can be manually (up to 64 different levels) or automatically controlled. A built-in attenuator is also provided to reduce audio clipping. For more advanced audio recording, the EOS M Digital Camera is compatible with many third-party electret condenser microphones with a 3.5mm diameter plug.  Video Snapshot With the Video Snapshot feature, the EOS M Digital Camera can capture short video clips (of 2, 4 or 8 seconds) then combine them automatically into one video file as a snapshot or highlights “album.” With no editing required after shooting, the compiled video is perfect for sharing online or displaying directly on an HDTV via the camera's HDMI port. Additionally, stills can be recorded during video shooting simply by pressing the camera’s shutter button. During playback, video clips in an album can now be reordered or deleted.\xa0    Extraordinary Image Quality and Processing Power \xa0 18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor The EOS M Digital Camera features Canon’s amazing 18.0 Megapixel CMOS (Complementary Metal Oxide Semiconductor) sensor. Perfect for enlargements or for cropping detailed portions of the composition, the EOS M Digital Camera’s sensor captures images with exceptional clarity and tonal range. This first-class sensor features many of the same new technologies used by professional Canon cameras to maximize each pixel's light-gathering efficiency and has center pixels that aid in the EOS M Digital Camera’s accurate AF performance. This APS-C size sensor creates an effective 1.6x field of view (compared to 35mm format). Versatile ISO Range for shooting in a wide variety of lighting conditions Thanks to its DIGIC 5 Image Processor, the EOS M Digital Camera features a versatile ISO range of ISO 100–6400 (expandable to 12800 in H mode) for video recording and ISO100–12800 (expandable to 25600 in H mode) for still image shooting. The EOS M Digital Camera, with the DIGIC 5 Image Processor's remarkable noise-reduction technology, delivers outstanding performance in low light for incredible video and photos.  DIGIC 5 Image Processor The EOS M Digital Camera features Canon’s DIGIC 5 Image Processor. The DIGIC 5 Image Processor works with the camera’s CMOS sensor to deliver images with incredible detail in more situations, without the need for artificial light sources. With the power of the DIGIC 5 Image Processor the EOS M Digital Camera can achieve higher ISO sensitivity and even perform advanced functions like HDR Backlight Control, art filters, lens correction and much more. The brilliant “brain” of the camera, this engine supercharges every facet of image capture.  Hybrid CMOS AF delivers fast autofocus speed for video and photos. The EOS M Digital Camera uses a hybrid AF system to deliver incredibly speedy and accurate focus. Its CMOS sensor has center-mounted pixels that are used for phase-difference AF. Phase difference AF is incredibly fast for general distance determination, while contrast AF is incredibly accurate, no matter the location of the focus point. By capitalizing on the strengths of phase-difference and contrast AF systems, the EOS M Digital Camera achieves precise AF, fast.  Sharp and Clear, with Tactile Controls \xa0 Touch Screen 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor II with multi-touch operation and Touch AF The EOS M Digital Camera comes with a newly engineered, Touch Screen 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor II. Using the same capacitive technology as today’s popular mobile devices, this new screen is touch-sensitive and delivers intuitive touch panel operation. Two finger touch gestures (multi-touch) can be used for zooming or changing images, menu and quick control settings can be accessed, and focus point and shutter release can be activated with the touch of a fingertip. The additional benefit of Touch AF makes it fast and easy to focus on any subject, by simply touching it on the screen. Displaying fine detail (at approximately 1.04 million pixels), this screen is perfect for composing and reviewing images. Thanks to a new, solid construction between the monitor’s resin-coated cover and the liquid crystal display, reflections are minimized, and the display can be viewed, without glare, from any number of angles. The LCD’s surface is treated with a smudge-resistant coating to minimize fingerprints and maintain a bright, clear image display.  A Comprehensive System Of EOS Optics \xa0 Compatible with the full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses (optional Mount Adapter EF-EOS M is required) The EOS M Digital Camera features a new style lens mount, called EF-M. Besides the dedicated EF-M lenses, the camera is compatible with the entire family of Canon EF and EF-S lenses by attaching the optional Mount Adapter EF-EOS M. When the adapter is used, the image quality of the lens is preserved, with no light loss or change to image stabilization.\xa0   From fisheye to telephoto and everywhere in between, Canon offers the most comprehensive lens collection on the planet, with the finest optics and most advanced technologies for whatever application is at hand. \xa0 When shooting video with one of Canon’s new STM lenses, the camera’s Movie Servo AF feature takes advantage of the lens’ stepping motor for smooth and quiet continuous AF. \xa0 Effects for Dramatic and Gorgeous Results  Handheld Night Scene mode Accessible right on the EOS M Digital Camera’s Mode Dial, Handheld Night Scene mode captures nightscapes with bright highlights and detailed dark areas, delivering results previously impossible without the use of a tripod. By shooting and combining four consecutive shots at a shutter speed fast enough to avoid camera shake, the EOS M Digital Camera’s Handheld Night Scene mode makes dramatic nighttime photography simple.  HDR Backlight Control mode The EOS M Digital Camera’s HDR Backlight Control mode ensures that backlit subjects are not recorded too dark. By shooting three consecutive shots at different exposures (underexposed, correctly exposed and overexposed) and then combining the images, the final result maintains detail in both the shadow and highlight areas, ensuring the backlit subject is properly exposed.  Seven Creative Filters, plus new Art Bold Effect and Water Painting Effect Adding to the fun and creative possibilities available with the EOS M Digital Camera are seven different creative filters that can dramatically alter the mood and visual effect of any particular scene. Creative Filters include Grainy Black and White, Soft Focus, Fish-eye Effect, Toy Camera Effect, Miniature Effect and new filters: Art Bold Effect (makes the photos look like an oil painting, with subjects appearing three-dimensional), and Water Painting Effect (photos are altered to look like a water-colored painting). Since the filters can be applied to the image after shooting, it’s easy to try several effects on the same shot. These creative effects can also be applied to video, for additional imaginative fun.  Multi Shot Noise Reduction To enhance its already admirable high ISO shooting capabilities, the EOS M Digital Camera features an intelligent Multi Shot Noise Reduction tool that reduces noise even further than the camera’s sensor and the DIGIC 5 Image Processor alone. With Multi Shot Noise Reduction activated, the camera takes four consecutive shots, merges and aligns them. This eliminates more noise than the traditional Noise Reduction filter, with little or no apparent resolution loss. Moving subjects are even optimized to minimize subject blur! Thanks to this clever new feature, high ISO shooting has never looked better.", 'EOS M Digital Camera Body EF-M 22mm f/2 STM Lens Neck Strap EM-100DB Battery Pack LP-E12 Battery Charger LC-E12 USB Interface Cable IFC-130U EOS Digital Solution Disk, Camera Instruction Manual and Software Instruction Manual CD']
